data.title: Dodge Center, MN
data.meta_description: Find out more information on our City Parks.
data.text:
North Park

North Park features our Aquatic Center, walking trails, tennis courts, pavilion, bathrooms, sand volleyball court, soccer fields and baseball/softball fields. North Park is also the home of the Dodge Center Veterans Memorial. In the summer of 2019 we will be adding more walking trails, a new parking lot, an inclusive playground, gardens, a pavilion and pickleball courts!

501 1st Ave NE, Dodge Center

Creek Park

Creek Park offers a half mile of wooded walking trails that run along the Dodge Center Creek. These trails also act as a perfect winter hiking trail - bring your snowshoes or rent some from the Dodge Center Library. You can also camp at Creek park! There are two camping spaces and fire pits available on a first come first served basis. There are pit toilets and a pavilion available for your use. Please note there is no electricity or water available. If you'd like more info on renting out a camping space, please click here.

1415 Highway Street West, Dodge Center

West Park

West Park is located in the heart of Dodge Center and offers many activities for the community. These activities include playground equipment, swings, horseshoes, and open grass space to run around. The pavilion houses picnic tables for your use and the park also offers two bathrooms.

101 4th Ave NW, Dodge Center

Tall Oaks Park

Tall Oaks Park is our smallest park and is located on South Street. While this park is small, it does feature a nice fenced in area with playground equipment and mature oak trees. There are also parking spaces reserved for park users for easy access.

104 South Street SW, Dodge Center

Lions Park

Lion's Park is our newest park! The park is currently under construction and the Dodge Center Lion's Club is currently fundraising for the playground equipment. The park will be geared toward preschool and early elementary aged children. If you'd like to donate to this project, you can make checks out to the City of Dodge Center. Stay tuned for more details!

604 6th Ave NW, Dodge Center
